text: Hollow Man is a 2000 British science fiction thriller movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and inspired by the 1897 novel The Invisible Man by H. G. Wells. It stars Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin, Kim Dickens, William Devane, Joey Slotnick and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2001 and was followed up by Hollow Man 2 in 2005. ==Other websites== * Category:2000 science fiction movies Category:2000 thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:German science fiction movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven Category:Movies based on books Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:2000s monster movies
title: Hollow Man
